turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peet's Coffee and espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what type of drink would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get a iced latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of milk is there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: peets has Non-fat, 2%, Whole, Soy, and Almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and do you want any sweetener or syrups in your drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't think so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. so you want a large iced latte with almond milk and whipped cream from peets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what peets will you be picking up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you still there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I will be picking it up in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicago, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, i've placed your order at the peets in chicago. The receipt will be sent to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)
